About_Community: Autism, or autism spectrum disorder (ASD), refers to a broad range of conditions characterized by challenges with social skills, repetitive behaviors, speech and nonverbal communication. The effects of  ASD and the severity of symptoms are different in each person.
Dos_n_Donts: Have patience. Give short mental breaks and repeat your words if they lose focus.
Give routines. Persons with autism enjoy having familiar routine tasks and are uncomfortable with unfamiliar tasks.
Force eye contact. Persons with autism have difficulty maintaining eye contact during interactions.
Panic. They might express their frustration in crowded and unfamiliar environments when they feel uncomfortable. Offering a quiet, peaceful space might help them calm down.
